item.title: Npc aggresion
item.dc:creator: @ill_pk_ur_as ill pk ur as
item.description:
@ill_pk_ur_as wrote:

i only needed

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } }

thanks i would rep if someone didnt reset my rep

Read full topic

item.title: Npc aggresion
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler.addItem(6570, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } }

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].animNumber = 2654; //jad dead }

case 2745: return 2653;

else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745 && misc.random(2) == 1) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2655; //poke npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 7; hitDiff = 4 + misc.random(25); }else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745 && misc.random(5) == 3) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2656; //crush gfxAll(451, EnemyY, EnemyX); npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 1; hitDiff = 4 + misc.random(35);

else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2656; npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 7; hitDiff = 4 + misc.random(25); } 

 Theres all the coding, add in correct place in npchandler

EDIT: Change 2745 to your npc id[br][br][size=1]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc aggresion

item.description:
@ill_pk_ur_as wrote:

[quote=“Evanz, post:2, topic:191210”]you need to edit npcHandler.

search for this (you should have it)

 if(p != null && person != null)

after the bracket add this

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 5)
if (npcs[i].npcType != 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == [color=red]NPCIDHERE)[/quote]

what about the attack method
